Articles.Content:
Here's the sitchiashun:

I'm currently testing one of my best fighter designs ever, the K-39. As you see in the screenies, I'm on team B, and the Radar and SAM site are on team A. I have Radar and SAM in guard mode, and my trigger is on. The data link between the two is active. No matter how close I fly, something between the Radar and the SAM doesn't click. When I switch to the Radar, I see myself on it, but it won't lock. I have a Weapon Manager on each vehicle. Any ideas?

Edited December 30, 2015 by GamerMitch

If you're within 3.5km of the SAM site, it'll probably try to kill you with those .50 caliber turrets you have on there, which may be obstructed.

Essentially, the site decides that instead of locking you up and launching on you, it'll try to kill you via it's turrets, and when it tries, the turrets get blocked by other parts on the vehicle.

 

Take off those turrets and tell me what happens.
